entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle this afternoon. Fog patches developing near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
